text: Su (stylized as SU; born 20 November 1973, in Tsujidō, Fujisawa, Kanagawa) is an MC for the hip hop unit Rip Slyme. His real name is . Su is also a member of Funky Grammar Unit. His former wife is singer-songwriter Ai Otsuka. He has one daughter, born on March 24, 2011. ==Discography== ===Internet songs=== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !
